==HierarchyTree==

Hierarchy will be established as a tree when the system started or the first time login. The tree can be retrieved statically (controlled using singleton pattern)

===API===

||*getTree()*||_return tree as an adjacent matrix_||{{{Hierarchy::getTree();}}}||
||*refreshTree()*||_refresh the tree, should be called whenever there are changes on roles(assign, unassign, new, delete)_||{{{Hierarchy::refreshTree();}}}||
||*getEffeciveRole($roles)*||_array $roles, get the role with the highest hierarchy in a certain role group, DFS_||{{{$roles = {'admin', 'manager'}; Hierarchy::getEffeciveRole($roles);}}}||
